```{=html}
<script>
// URL hash (#ja, #en) to switch tabs
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('.panel-tabset .nav-link');

  // Activate tab based on URL hash
  const activate = () => {
    const hash = location.hash.slice(1);
    tabs.forEach(tab => {
      const text = tab.textContent.toLowerCase();
      if ((hash === 'ja' && text.includes('japanese')) ||
          (hash === 'en' && text.includes('english'))) {
        tab.click();
      }
    });
  };

  // Update URL hash when tab is clicked
  tabs.forEach(tab => {
    tab.addEventListener('click', () => {
      const lang = tab.textContent.toLowerCase().includes('japanese') ? 'ja' : 'en';
      history.replaceState(null, null, `#${lang}`);
    });
  });

  activate();
  addEventListener('hashchange', activate);
});
</script>
```
